featured.text: “So many people want to protect animals and live their lives without causing unnecessary cruelty.
The cruelty of a barking hound.

definition.zh_def: 殘忍；殘酷的行為或態度。
definition.en_def: The quality of being cruel; actions or attitudes that cause suffering or pain to others.
definition.example: The cruelty of the punishment shocked everyone in the community.
